articles.author: Hilary George-Parkin
articles.title: How blockchain will allow for fewer counterfeit goods and faster product recalls
articles.description: Blockchain can protect customer data and make for more transparent supply chains
articles.content: The technology behind bitcoin is coming for retail, and you probably won’t even notice. De Beers is putting diamonds on the blockchain. Walmart is putting lettuce on the blockchain. Startups are putting skin care and liquor and fancy watches on the blockchain… [+14971 chars]
